summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Solid Waste Utility; authorizing execution of an agreement with King County for disposal of the City's solid waste at King County disposal facilities; designating the King County disposal system as the disposal system as the disposal system for Seattle solid waste during the term of the agreement; increasing the expenditure allowances in the 1986 budget of the Solid Waste Utility, making an appropriation from the Engineering Department Operating Fund reimbursable from the Solid Waste Fund and authorizing the payment to King County of the up-front costs specified in the agreement.
